previous.excerpt: Tabius is an easy to use Tab Grouping assistant for Chrome. If you use tab grouping or couldn't use it due to lack of options, Tabius is a must have for you. It lets you customize Chrome's Tab Grouping feature by creating custom rules, blocklist and many more!
previous.title: Tabius - An automatic tab grouping extension for your browser
